alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 10:23PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Coffee, Bacon, southeastern Jeff Davis and northwestern Appling Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1023 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Alma. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Alma, Graham, Denton, New Lacy and Pine Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
